answers.answer: Does he change fingers when he does his finger sticks?  Next question is:  does he test at all, and if so, how often?
It sounds like it may be arthritis which tends to hurt more at night.

question: My husband was recently diagnosed with Type II diabetes.  For the last two nights he has had a lot of pain in his right pointer finger.  it only hurts at night time.  any idea what ccould cause it
title: Finger pain and diabetes
